name: Raidraptor - Arsenal Falcon
text:
2 Level 7 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Special Summon 1 Level 4 Winged Beast-Type monster from your Deck. If this card has a "Raidraptor" monster(s) as Xyz Material, it can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of Xyz Material attached to it. If this card is sent to the Graveyard while it has a "Raidraptor" monster as Xyz Material: You can Special Summon 1 "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, except "Raidraptor - Arsenal Falcon", and if you do, attach this card from the Graveyard to that Xyz Monster as Xyz Material.
